rooms.description: Large living room with floor-to-ceiling windows and an open design to maximize natural light in accordance with Vastu principles.
Dining room adjacent to the living area for a seamless indoor-outdoor experience.
Eco-friendly kitchen design with energy-efficient appliances and natural ventilation.
Master bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for ample sunlight and a view of the surrounding greenery.
Second bedroom with adequate space and natural lighting; designed following Vastu guidelines for privacy and comfort.
Master bathroom integrated into the master bedroom ensuring convenience and eco-friendly water usage.

openings.description: Front door designed to face the north for auspicious entry as per Vastu.
Floor-to-ceiling side windows on the east wall to invite positive energy and natural light.
Back door positioned according to Vastu guidelines for optimal energy flow.

other_features.description: Eco-friendly swimming pool featuring natural water filtration and energy-efficient pumps.
